title: 11. The Goat Spider Violin
description:
Wowie, first ever 11th episode! In today's discussion, Chris talks about the guy getting dragged off that United Airlines flight. Also discussed: Coachella, Stagecoach, country music, Shania Twain, expensive violins, pet snakes (don't get 'em), throwing hecklers out of live shows, and a whole bunch of questions from Twitter.
Tweet your questions and spread the love using the hashtag  #congratulationspod on Twitter and everywhere else. Today's episode was brought to you by Square Cash.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
